title: eva love thread
body:
it has come to my attention that some people are harboring ill will towards eva and scamming her out of $11 and this just won't do. so today we are discussing our love for her

reasons i love evangele:

- she is so generous and kind
- she always wards the brush
- she lets me photoshop her face on hooters waitresses
- she's pure and doesn't even acknowledge that men besides her husband exist because that's just how loyal she is

what are some reasons you love evangele? share your thoughts in comments! rudeposters will politely be asked to leave as per usual
